articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Tata Group plans to merge carriers under Air India, scrap Vistara brand - Moneycontrol
articles.description: India’s largest conglomerate is considering scrapping the Vistara brand, which is Singapore Airlines Ltd’s local affiliate in the South Asian nation; Singapore Airlines is evaluating the size of the stake it should take in the combined entity.
